name: Souls (itch) (LAgg)
description:
Check out some of my other games! Aml | Less Is More Once upon a time the world was peaceful place full of pure souls, but everything changed when infected soles appeared from sins, full of Envy  Hate    Arrogance start infecting the pure souls the world has become a terrible place to live in but there is a way it's your mission to set all the souls free, The world depends on you! 🦅

Use your soul skills to wake up the souls that infected by envy ! 

The entire world is about to collapse, and you are the last hope!

  • All rights reserved for Lagg Studio.
  • The game made for Tafra Jam under the them ("infected ").
  • All code and art were made by Lagg studio during the time of the jam.
  • Background music source opengameart .
  • All SFX are free source assets with license 0. 
  • Use WASD or Arrow to move.
  • Use mouse lift click to shoot your soul shout.
  • Use mouse right click to Dash.

Development Team

  • Developer - Ahmed Mostafa (Twitter)
